author: s9tpepper
msg: Added information to the source page regarding automated testing libraries for Apache Flex SDK.

author: mbautin
msg: [jira] [HBASE-4218] [89-fb] Porting HFile data block encoding to 89-fb
This is the 89-fb version of the data block encoding patch at
https://reviews.facebook.net/D447 (based on Jacek Midgal's work during
his 2011 summer internship at Facebook).  The trunk patch has already
gone through an extensive review cycle.  Please see the JIRA and the
Test Plan: Unit tests, dev cluster, deploy and run load test

author: mbautin
msg: Summary: The original 89-fb commit of HBASE-5411 (D409330) broke the build, and
this is a follow-up two-line fix.
Test Plan: Build, run unit tests
